channel.title: Portfolios on NLP Ventures
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on NLP Ventures

item.title: 1 - The Players' Tribune
item.description: Mark French has created and operated disruptive business innovations in the sports, consumer goods, media and technology industries. As the recipient of three ‘40 Under 40 Awards’ in three separate business sectors, Mark has proven that his passion, creativity, leadership and entrepreneurial skill sets drive sustainable growth across industries. Mark is an active investor, board member and advisor for companies that share his drive to disrupt and innovate in Sports, Media and Technology.
